text: A man who had two hens bought a domestic parrot and took it to the barn with them to feed it. But these attacked and chased her, and the parrot, thinking they were doing it because they were a different species, felt humiliated. But days later he saw the hens fighting among themselves, and that every time they separated they were covered in blood. And she said in her heart, I will not grieve that the cockles have hurt me; for I have seen that they are not even at peace among themselves. If the neighbors don't live in peace, neither will you.
title: Los gallos y la perdiz
author: nan Esopo
